whyUs.metaDescription: Why choose Mindzy over a traditional web agency? Custom design, delivery in 2 weeks, unlimited support, transparent pricing.

titles.cta: Ready to transform your online presence?
titles.ctaSubtitle: Book a free 30-minute discovery call to discuss your project.

differentiators.title: An approach centered on your reality
differentiators.description: We never start from a template or a rigid process. Every project begins with understanding your business, your workflows, and your constraints.

differentiators.title: Custom projects, not products
differentiators.description: We design websites, applications, and internal systems tailored to simple or complex needs, without forcing your project into a predefined framework.
details: Scalability built in from the start
From simple projects to structured systems

differentiators.title: Human and committed support
differentiators.description: At Mindzy, you're not just another file. We guide, advise, and adjust the project with you at every step.

differentiators.title: Built-in SEO expertise
differentiators.description: Visibility is not an add-on, it's part of the project. SEO is integrated from the design phase to ensure a healthy and lasting foundation.

differentiators.title: Projects built to last
differentiators.description: We prioritize stability, clarity, and maintainability. The goal: a project that stays relevant and usable over time.

differentiators.title: A consistent experience across all devices
differentiators.description: Every project is designed to be fluid and consistent, regardless of the screen or context of use.

process.title: Understanding & scoping
process.description: We take the time to understand your business, goals, and constraints to define a clear and relevant framework.

process.title: Custom design
process.description: We design an approach tailored to your needs: structure, features, and technical directions, validated with you.

process.title: Development & adjustments
process.description: We develop the project progressively, with regular exchanges and adjustments based on your feedback.

process.title: Launch & support
process.description: The project is deployed and we remain available to support you in getting started and future evolutions.

engagements.title: A clear and transparent relationship
engagements.description: We work with clear exchanges, shared decisions, and a common vision of the project from the start.

engagements.title: A project designed with you
engagements.description: Every project is built in collaboration. Your feedback and understanding are an integral part of the process.

engagements.title: A solid and lasting foundation
engagements.description: We design stable, maintainable projects built to evolve, without unnecessary dependencies or superfluous complexity.

engagements.title: A responsible approach
engagements.description: We apply best practices in security, confidentiality, and reliability, adapted to the nature of your project.
